t: A Song of Praise to the Sovereign Lord
The*pn Lord*s reigns; Let*ld the earth rejoice; Let*ld the multitude of isles be glad!
Clouds*ln and darkness surround Him; Righteousness*ld and justice are*i the foundation of His throne.
A*ld fire goes before Him, And*ld burns up His enemies round about.
His*ld lightnings light the world; The*ld earth sees and trembles.
The*ld mountains melt like wax at the presence of the Lord,*s At*ld the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
The*ld heavens declare His righteousness, And*ld all the peoples see His glory.
Let*ln all be put to shame who serve carved images, Who*ld boast of idols. Worship*ld Him, all you*i gods.
Zion*ld hears and is glad, And*ld the daughters of Judah rejoice Because*ld of Your judgments, O Lord.*s
For*ld You, Lord,*s are*i most high above all the earth; You*ld are exalted far above all gods.
You*ln who love the Lord,*s hate evil! He*ld preserves the souls of His saints; He*ld delivers them out of the hand of the wicked.
Light*ld is sown for the righteous, And*ld gladness for the upright in heart.
Rejoice*ld in the Lord,*s you righteous, And*ld give thanks at the remembrance of His holy name.
